snippet.title: Title: Parallel-sequencing of early-type and spiral galaxies
snippet.description:
Title: Parallel-sequencing of early-type and spiral galaxies
Authors: Michele Cappellari (University of Oxford)
Comments: 1 page, 1 figure, LaTeX. Invited talk to the Special Session 3 "Galaxy Evolution Through Secular Processes". To appear in Highlights of Astronomy, Vol. 16, Proc. of the XXVIII IAU General Assembly, Beijing, China, August 2012, ed. T. Montmerle. Cambridge University Press
Subjects: Cosmology and Nongalactic Astrophysics (astro-ph.CO)
